import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Path from "../../paths"; import useForm from "../../hooks/useForm"; import authContext from "../../context/authContext" import {useContext} from "react"; const registerFormKeys = { Email: "email", Password: "password", PasswordConfirm: "passwordConfirm", Description: "description", } export default function Register() { const {registerSubmitHandler} = useContext(authContext) const {values, onChange, onSubmit} = useForm(registerSubmitHandler, { [registerFormKeys.Email]: '', [registerFormKeys.Password]: '', [registerFormKeys.PasswordConfirm]: '', [registerFormKeys.Description]: '', }); return (
